articles.title: Coronavirus: China announces drop in new cases for third straight day
articles.description: Foreign minister Wang Yi said the fall showed the outbreak was being managed effectively.
articles.content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 Over 1,660 have died in China since the coronavirus outbreak began
China has announced a drop in new cases from the coronavirus outbreak for a third consecutive day.
On Sunday, authorities reported 2,009 new cases and 1… [+3683 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: China enacts tighter restrictions in Hubei
articles.description: China says its measures are working as cases fall for a third day straight.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Activities in Wuhan are being further restricted
China is tightening curbs on movement in Hubei province as it battles the outbreak of new coronavirus.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Forty Americans evacuated from cruise ship infected
articles.description: They are among some 400 Americans being taken off the Diamond Princess quarantined in Japan.
articles.content:
Image copyrightEPAImage caption
 There are around 3,400 on board the Diamond Princess
Forty Americans being taken off the quarantined cruise ship Diamond Princess are infected with new coronavirus, a US official says.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Couple quarantined on cruise ship criticise UK government
articles.description: David Abel and his wife, Sally, accuse the UK government of ignoring their pleas for help.
articles.content:
Image copyrightPA MediaImage caption
 David Abel said he had little confidence the UK government would rescue him and his wife

articles.title: Coronavirus: Praise for Scotland's response to outbreak
articles.description: The chief medical officer thanks health workers and the public for how the country has dealt with the Covid-19 virus.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
Scotland's chief medical officer has praised health workers for their response to the coronavirus outbreak.
